name: Forbidden Gate
description:
Forbidden Gate is a short action adventure with a third-person perspective. The game is set in a fictional fantasy environment. 

The player controls Marlett, a girl who is looking for a missing / kidnapped friend.

Currently there is only one task in the game, try to complete it.

Controls:

Move: W A S D
Axe: Q
Interact: E
Sprint: LShift
Dodge/Roll: Space
Attack: LMB
Pause: P (Esc)
